languages.text: "Когда они закончат с похвалами, процессия двинется дальше. У звездной гавани вас будет ждать губернатор Медина и костер, подготовленный для сожжения тела еретички, так называемой Зари. Вам передадут освященный представителем {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархии{/g} огнемет. Вы можете лично осуществить сожжение. Но если желаете подчеркнуть дружеский союз династий фон Валанциус и Винтерскейл — будет уместно уступить честь сожжения губернатору Медине. Но решать в любом случае вам!"

traits.locale_text: "Когда они закончат с похвалами, процессия двинется дальше. У звездной гавани вас будет ждать губернатор Медина и костер, подготовленный для сожжения тела еретички, так называемой Зари. Вам передадут освященный представителем {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархии{/g} огнемет. Вы можете лично осуществить сожжение. Но если желаете подчеркнуть дружеский союз династий фон Валанциус и Винтерскейл — будет уместно уступить честь сожжения губернатору Медине. Но решать в любом случае вам!"

languages.text: "Once they have said their praise, the procession will move on. Governor Medineh will await you by the starport. It is also where the pyre has been built for burning the body of the heretic known as Aurora. You will be handed a flamer blessed by a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. You can choose to personally perform the burning. But if you wish to underscore the amicable alliance between House von Valancius and House Winterscale, it will be fitting to pass the honour of the burning to Governor Medineh. However, the choice is yours!"
languages.original_text: "Когда они закончат с похвалами, процессия двинется дальше. У звездной гавани вас будет ждать губернатор Медина и костер, подготовленный для сожжения тела еретички, так называемой Зари. Вам передадут освященный представителем {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархии{/g} огнемет. Вы можете лично осуществить сожжение. Но если желаете подчеркнуть дружеский союз династий фон Валанциус и Винтерскейл — будет уместно уступить честь сожжения губернатору Медине. Но решать в любом случае вам!"

traits.locale_text: "Once they have said their praise, the procession will move on. Governor Medineh will await you by the celestial harbour. It's also where the pyre has been built for burning the body of the heretic known as Aurora. You will be handed a flamethrower blessed by a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. You can choose to personally perform the burning. But if you wish to underscore the amicable alliance between House von Valancius and House Winterscale, it will be fitting to pass the honour of the burning to Governor Medineh. Either way, the choice is yours!"

"Once they have said their praise, the procession will move on. Governor Medineh will await you by the celestial harbour. It's also where the pyre has been built for burning the body of the heretic known as Aurora. You will be handed a flamethrower blessed by a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. You can choose to personally perform the burning. But if you wish to underscore the amicable alliance between House von Valancius and House Winterscale, it will be fitting to pass the honour of the burning to Governor Medineh. Either way, the choice is yours!"

"Once they have said their praise, the procession will move on. Governor Medineh will await you by the starport. It is also where the pyre has been built for burning the body of the heretic known as Aurora. You will be handed a flamer blessed by a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. You can choose to personally perform the burning. But if you wish to underscore the amicable alliance between House von Valancius and House Winterscale, it will be fitting to pass the honour of the burning to Governor Medineh. However, the choice is yours!"

"Once they have said their praise, the procession will move on. Governor Medineh will await you by the starport. It is also where the pyre has been built for burning the body of the heretic known as Aurora. You will be handed a flamer blessed by a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. You can choose to personally perform the burning. But if you wish to underscore the amicable alliance between House von Valancius and House Winterscale, it will be fitting to pass the honour of the burning to Governor Medineh. However, the choice is yours!"

languages.text: "Sobald sie ihrem Dank Ausdruck verliehen haben, zieht die Prozession weiter. Gouverneur Medineh erwartet Euch am Raumhafen. Dort wurde auch der Scheiterhaufen errichtet, auf dem der Leichnam der Ketzerin namens Aurora verbrannt wird. Man wird Euch einen Flammenwerfer überreichen, der von einem Vertreter der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g} gesegnet wurde. Ihr könnt entscheiden, den Leichnam persönlich zu verbrennen. Wenn Ihr aber das freundschaftliche Bündnis zwischen Haus Valancius und Haus Winterzunder unterstreichen möchtet, ist es ratsam, diese Ehre Gouverneur Medineh zu überlassen. Die Entscheidung liegt jedoch bei Euch!"
languages.original_text: "Once they have said their praise, the procession will move on. Governor Medineh will await you by the starport. It is also where the pyre has been built for burning the body of the heretic known as Aurora. You will be handed a flamer blessed by a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. You can choose to personally perform the burning. But if you wish to underscore the amicable alliance between House von Valancius and House Winterscale, it will be fitting to pass the honour of the burning to Governor Medineh. However, the choice is yours!"

traits.locale_text: "Sobald sie ihrem Dank Ausdruck verliehen haben, zieht die Prozession weiter. Gouverneur Medineh erwartet Euch am Raumhafen. Dort wurde auch der Scheiterhaufen errichtet, auf dem der Leichnam der Ketzerin namens Aurora verbrannt wird. Man wird Euch einen Flammenwerfer überreichen, der von einem Vertreter der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g} gesegnet wurde. Ihr könnt entscheiden, den Leichnam persönlich zu verbrennen. Wenn Ihr aber das freundschaftliche Bündnis zwischen Haus Valancius und Haus Winterzunder unterstreichen möchtet, ist es ratsam, diese Ehre Gouverneur Medineh zu überlassen. Die Entscheidung liegt jedoch bei Euch!"

languages.text: « Une fois que vous aurez entendu leurs louanges, le cortège repartira. Le gouverneur Medineh vous attendra près de l'astroport. C'est aussi là qu'a été construit le bûcher où sera brûlé le corps de l'hérétique appelée Aurore. Vous recevrez un lance-flammes béni par un représentant de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g}. Vous pourrez allumer vous-même le bûcher, mais si vous souhaitez souligner l'alliance amicale entre la maison von Valancius et la maison Winterscale, il serait de bon ton de laisser cet honneur au gouverneur Medineh. Quoi qu'il en soit, le choix vous appartient ! »
languages.original_text: "Once they have said their praise, the procession will move on. Governor Medineh will await you by the starport. It is also where the pyre has been built for burning the body of the heretic known as Aurora. You will be handed a flamer blessed by a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. You can choose to personally perform the burning. But if you wish to underscore the amicable alliance between House von Valancius and House Winterscale, it will be fitting to pass the honour of the burning to Governor Medineh. However, the choice is yours!"

traits.locale_text: « Une fois que vous aurez entendu leurs louanges, le cortège repartira. Le gouverneur Medineh vous attendra près de l'astroport. C'est aussi là qu'a été construit le bûcher où sera brûlé le corps de l'hérétique appelée Aurore. Vous recevrez un lance-flammes béni par un représentant de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g}. Vous pourrez enflammer le bûcher vous-même, mais si vous souhaitez souligner l'alliance amicale entre la maison von Valancius et la maison Winterscale, il serait de bon ton de laisser cet honneur au gouverneur Medineh. Quoi qu'il en soit, le choix vous appartient ! »

languages.text: “等他们说完赞美之词，队伍就会继续前进。梅迪涅总督会在星港等您，‘极光’的尸体也会在那里进行焚烧。您会得到由{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}代表亲自祝福过的火焰喷射器。您可以选择亲自执行燃烧，而如果您打算强调冯·瓦兰修斯家族与温特斯凯尔家族之间的友好联盟，您也可以把焚烧尸体的荣誉交给梅迪涅总督。不过，选择权在您！”
languages.original_text: "Once they have said their praise, the procession will move on. Governor Medineh will await you by the starport. It is also where the pyre has been built for burning the body of the heretic known as Aurora. You will be handed a flamer blessed by a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. You can choose to personally perform the burning. But if you wish to underscore the amicable alliance between House von Valancius and House Winterscale, it will be fitting to pass the honour of the burning to Governor Medineh. However, the choice is yours!"

traits.locale_text: “等他们说完赞美之词，队伍就会继续前进。梅迪涅总督会在星港等您，‘极光’的尸体也会在那里进行焚烧。您会得到由{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}代表亲自祝福过的火焰喷射器。您可以选择亲自执行燃烧，而如果您打算强调冯·瓦兰修斯家族与温特斯凯尔家族之间的友好联盟，您也可以把焚烧尸体的荣誉交给梅迪涅总督。不过，选择权在您！”

languages.text: 「国民から賛美の言葉をかけられたら、行列は進みます。メディネ総督がスターポートで陛下をお待ちです。そこには火葬場があり、異端者オーロラの死体を燃やすために建てました。陛下には、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}の代表が祝福したフレイマーが手渡されます。陛下自ら火葬することもできますが、フォン・ヴァランシウス家とウィンタースケール家の友好同盟を強調したいならば、火葬の栄誉をメディネ総督に渡すのが好ましいでしょう。ただ、いかがなさるかは陛下次第です！」
languages.original_text: "Once they have said their praise, the procession will move on. Governor Medineh will await you by the starport. It is also where the pyre has been built for burning the body of the heretic known as Aurora. You will be handed a flamer blessed by a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. You can choose to personally perform the burning. But if you wish to underscore the amicable alliance between House von Valancius and House Winterscale, it will be fitting to pass the honour of the burning to Governor Medineh. However, the choice is yours!"

traits.locale_text: 「国民から賛美の言葉をかけられたら、行列は進みます。メディネ総督がスターポートで陛下をお待ちです。そこには火葬場があり、異端者オーロラの死体を燃やすために建てました。陛下には、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}の代表が祝福した火炎放射器が手渡されます。陛下自ら火葬することもできますが、フォン・ヴァランシウス家とウィンタースケール家の友好同盟を強調したいならば、火葬の栄誉をメディネ総督に渡すのが好ましいでしょう。ただ、いかがなさるかは陛下次第です！」

languages.text: «Una vez que hayan dicho sus elogios, la procesión seguirá adelante. El gobernador Medineh le esperará en el puerto estelar. También es donde se ha construido la pira para quemar el cuerpo de la hereje conocida como Aurora. Le entregarán un lanzallamas bendecido por un representante de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g}. Puede optar por encargarse personalmente de la quema. Pero si desea destacar la alianza amistosa entre la casa von Valancius y la casa Winterscale, será apropiado pasar el honor de la quema al gobernador Medineh. Sin embargo, ¡la elección es suya!».
languages.original_text: "Once they have said their praise, the procession will move on. Governor Medineh will await you by the starport. It is also where the pyre has been built for burning the body of the heretic known as Aurora. You will be handed a flamer blessed by a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. You can choose to personally perform the burning. But if you wish to underscore the amicable alliance between House von Valancius and House Winterscale, it will be fitting to pass the honour of the burning to Governor Medineh. However, the choice is yours!"

traits.locale_text: «Una vez que hayan dicho sus elogios, la procesión seguirá adelante. El Gobernador Medineh os esperará en el puerto estelar. También es donde se ha construido la pira para quemar el cuerpo de la hereje conocida como Aurora. Le entregarán un lanzallamas bendecido por un representante de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g}. Puede optar por encargarse personalmente de la quema. Pero si desea destacar la alianza amistosa entre la Casa von Valancius y la Casa Winterscale, será apropiado pasar el honor de la quema al Gobernador Medineh. Sin embargo, ¡la elección es suya!».

languages.text: "Övgülere mazhar oluşunuzun ardından tören alayı yola devam edecek. Vali Medineh sizi yıldız limanında karşılayacak. Aurora adlı kâfirin cesedinin cayır cayır yanacağı mekân da orası olacak. Akabinde size {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekleşiarşi{/g} temsilcisinin kutsadığı bir alevsaçan sunulacak. Kâfiri bizzat yakabilirsiniz elbette lakin von Valancius ve Winterscale haneleri arasındaki dostane ittifakı pekiştirmeyi dilerseniz bu şerefi Vali Medineh'e devredebilirsiniz. Karar tamamen sizin!"
languages.original_text: "Once they have said their praise, the procession will move on. Governor Medineh will await you by the starport. It is also where the pyre has been built for burning the body of the heretic known as Aurora. You will be handed a flamer blessed by a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}. You can choose to personally perform the burning. But if you wish to underscore the amicable alliance between House von Valancius and House Winterscale, it will be fitting to pass the honour of the burning to Governor Medineh. However, the choice is yours!"

traits.locale_text: "Millet ayaklarınıza kapandıktan sonra yola devam edeceğiz. Vali Medineh sizi yıldız limanında karşılayacak. Aurora adlı kâfirin cesedinin cayır cayır yanacağı mekân da orası olacak. Akabinde size {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekleşiarşi{/g} temsilcisinin kutsadığı bir meşale sunulacak. Kâfiri bizzat yakmayı da tercih edebilirsiniz. Ancak von Valancius ve Winterscale haneleri arasındaki değerli ittifakı pekiştirmeyi dilerseniz yakma şerefini Vali Medineh'e devredebilirsiniz. Karar tamamen sizin!"
